title: Using Curse Words: Finding Unusual Solutions to Life's “Worst” Troubles
description: Overwhelm had become my identity. Exhaustion was my status symbol. And with those two lovely masters ruling me, I couldn't see past the struggle and into the limitlessness God created me to dwell in.Drowning in a sea of my own creation, I couldn't breathe above the doubts, the opinions, the anxiety of running a startup business with little direction and seemingly no support while three small children spilled juice on my keyboard. And then the craziest thing happened. While writhing in my sea of self-pity, I shouted out a string of curse words and realized I could use my “curse words” to my advantage. They'd used me long enough.“Stress,” “Overwhelm,” “Loneliness,” and (the worst) “Always and Never.” I found my truth within the lies, and I'm riding it all the way to the top. Let me show you how...
author: Myra Fiacco
